com.hp.ov.sdk.rest.client.server

Interface ServerHardwareClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AddableResource<AddServer>, PatchableResource, RemovableResource, RetrievableResource<ServerHardware>, SearchableResource<ServerHardware>

    public interface ServerHardwareClient
extends AddableResource<AddServer>, SearchableResource<ServerHardware>, RemovableResource, PatchableResource

    • Field Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BiosSettings getBios(String resourceId)
      Retrieves the list of BIOS/UEFI values currently set on the physical server.
      EnvironmentalConfiguration getEnvironmentConfiguration(String resourceId)
      Retrieves the settings that describe the environmental configuration (supported feature set, calibrated minimum and maximum power, location, and dimensions, ...) of the server hardware resource.
      IloSsoUrlResult getIloSsoUrl(String resourceId)
      Retrieves the URL to launch a Single Sign-On (SSO) session for the iLO web interface.
      JavaRemoteConsoleUrlResult getJavaRemoteConsoleUrl(String resourceId)
      This module aids in generating a Single Sign-On (SSO) session for the iLO Java Applet console and returns the URL to launch it.
      RemoteConsoleUrlResult getRemoteConsoleUrl(String resourceId)
      Generates a Single Sign-On (SSO) session for the iLO Integrated Remote Console Application (IRC) and returns the URL to launch it.
      ServerFirmwareInventory getServerFirmwareInventory(String resourceId)
      Retrieves the ServerFirmwareInventory details for the specified server hardware.
      ResourceCollection<ServerFirmwareInventory> getServerFirmwareInventoryByFilter(FirmwareInventoryFilter filter)
      Retrieves the ServerFirmwareInventory details for the specified server hardware.
      UtilizationData getUtilization(String resourceId)
      Retrieves the UtilizationData details for the specified server hardware.
      EnvironmentalConfiguration updateEnvironmentConfiguration(String resourceId, EnvironmentalConfigurationUpdate environmentalConfigurationUpdate)
      Updates the calibrated max power of an unmanaged or unsupported server hardware resource.
      TaskResource updateMpFirmwareVersion(String resourceId, RequestOption... options)
      Updates the iLO firmware on a physical server to a minimum iLO firmware version required by HPE OneView to manage the server.
      TaskResource updatePowerState(String resourceId, ServerPowerControlRequest serverPowerControlRequest, RequestOption... options)
      Requests a power operation to change the power state of the physical server.
      TaskResource updateRefreshState(String resourceId, RefreshStateRequest refreshStateRequest, RequestOption... options)
      Refreshes the server hardware to fix configuration issues.

    • Method Detail

      • updatePowerState

        TaskResource updatePowerState(String resourceId,
                              ServerPowerControlRequest serverPowerControlRequest,
                              RequestOption... options)
        Requests a power operation to change the power state of the physical server.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - server hardware resource identifier as seen in HPE OneView.
        serverPowerControlRequest - object containing the ServerPowerControlRequest details.
        options - varargs of RequestOption, which can be used to specify some request options.
        Returns:
        TaskResource which returns the task status for the process.

      • updateRefreshState

        TaskResource updateRefreshState(String resourceId,
                                RefreshStateRequest refreshStateRequest,
                                RequestOption... options)
        Refreshes the server hardware to fix configuration issues.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - server hardware resource identifier as seen in HPE OneView.
        refreshStateRequest - object containing the refresh state request details.
        options - varargs of RequestOption, which can be used to specify some request options.
        Returns:
        TaskResource which returns the task status for the process.

      • getBios

        BiosSettings getBios(String resourceId)
        Retrieves the list of BIOS/UEFI values currently set on the physical server.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - server hardware resource identifier as seen in HPE OneView.
        Returns:
        BiosSettings containing the collection of bios settings state details.

      • getEnvironmentConfiguration

        EnvironmentalConfiguration getEnvironmentConfiguration(String resourceId)
        Retrieves the settings that describe the environmental configuration (supported feature set, calibrated minimum and maximum power, location, and dimensions, ...) of the server hardware resource.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - server hardware resource identifier as seen in HPE OneView.
        Returns:
        EnvironmentalConfiguration containing the environmental configuration details.

      • updateEnvironmentConfiguration

        EnvironmentalConfiguration updateEnvironmentConfiguration(String resourceId,
                                                          EnvironmentalConfigurationUpdate environmentalConfigurationUpdate)
        Updates the calibrated max power of an unmanaged or unsupported server hardware resource.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - server hardware resource identifier as seen in HPE OneView.
        environmentalConfigurationUpdate - details of the environmental configuration.
        Returns:
        EnvironmentalConfiguration containing the environmental configuration details.

      • updateMpFirmwareVersion

        TaskResource updateMpFirmwareVersion(String resourceId,
                                     RequestOption... options)
        Updates the iLO firmware on a physical server to a minimum iLO firmware version required by HPE OneView to manage the server.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - server hardware resource identifier as seen in HPE OneView.
        options - varargs of RequestOption, which can be used to specify some request options.
        Returns:
        TaskResource which returns the task status for the process.

      • getIloSsoUrl

        IloSsoUrlResult getIloSsoUrl(String resourceId)
        Retrieves the URL to launch a Single Sign-On (SSO) session for the iLO web interface.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - server hardware resource identifier as seen in HPE OneView.
        Returns:
        IloSsoUrlResult containing the iLO SSO URL details.

      • getJavaRemoteConsoleUrl

        JavaRemoteConsoleUrlResult getJavaRemoteConsoleUrl(String resourceId)
        This module aids in generating a Single Sign-On (SSO) session for the iLO Java Applet console and returns the URL to launch it. If the server hardware is unmanaged or unsupported, the resulting URL will not use SSO and the iLO Java Applet will prompt for credentials.

        Note: this is not supported on G7/iLO3 or earlier servers.

        Parameters:
        resourceId - server hardware resource identifier as seen in HPE OneView.
        Returns:
        JavaRemoteConsoleUrlResult containing the Java remote console URL details.

      • getRemoteConsoleUrl

        RemoteConsoleUrlResult getRemoteConsoleUrl(String resourceId)
        Generates a Single Sign-On (SSO) session for the iLO Integrated Remote Console Application (IRC) and returns the URL to launch it. If the server hardware is unmanaged or unsupported, the resulting URL will not use SSO and the IRC application will prompt for credentials. Use of this URL requires a previous installation of the iLO IRC and is supported only on Windows client.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - server hardware resource identifier as seen in HPE OneView.
        Returns:
        RemoteConsoleUrlResult containing the remote console URL details.

      • getUtilization

        UtilizationData getUtilization(String resourceId)
        Retrieves the UtilizationData details for the specified server hardware.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - server hardware resource identifier as seen in HPE OneView.
        Returns:
        UtilizationData object containing the details.

      • getServerFirmwareInventoryByFilter

        ResourceCollection<ServerFirmwareInventory> getServerFirmwareInventoryByFilter(FirmwareInventoryFilter filter)
        Retrieves the ServerFirmwareInventory details for the specified server hardware.
        Parameters:
        filter - used specify some filters that will be applied to narrow the results.
        Returns:
        ResourceCollection<ServerFirmwareInventory> containing the details for all found server hardware.

      • getServerFirmwareInventory

        ServerFirmwareInventory getServerFirmwareInventory(String resourceId)
        Retrieves the ServerFirmwareInventory details for the specified server hardware.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - server hardware resource identifier as seen in HPE OneView.
        Returns:
        ServerFirmwareInventory object containing the details.
